text: And what burden is on them if they were to believe in God and the Last Day and expend of what God has provided them·∏ç God is ever Aware of them. There is no difficulty for them in putting their faith and trust in God. Indeed if they were to have faith they would attain glorious honor in this world and the hereafter. Nothing prompts them to turn away from [God] but their lack of commitment and respect.
